data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Betty is a mean old lady. She ____ near a park, and ____ yells ____ the ____ for ____ too ____. She ____ gives ____ for Halloween, ____ she ____ talks ____ her ____. She owns four cats, and they are her only friends.
data.partBlankContent: Betty is a mean old lady. She li___ near a park, and alw___ yells a_ the ki__ for be___ too lo__. She ne___ gives ca___ for Halloween, a__ she ne___ talks t_ her neig_____. She owns four cats, and they are her only friends.
data.fullContent: Betty is a mean old lady. She lives near a park, and always yells at the kids for being too loud. She never gives candy for Halloween, and she never talks to her neighbors. She owns four cats, and they are her only friends.
data.answer: 贝蒂是个刻薄的老太太。她住在公园附近，总是因为孩子们太吵而对他们大吼大叫。她在万圣节从不给糖果，也从不和邻居说话。她有四只猫，它们是她唯一的朋友。
